article: I have a friend who prepares taxes. He talked with me once about some of his _ clients --those with six-figure _ . Some of these people, he said, despite the obvious tax benefits, _ to give away any of their money. Some are spending more _ in raising their pets than in feeding hungry children. They simply have not discovered the importance and power of _ . And sadly, these rich clients are in a position to do _ meaningful, but they _ to do nothing at all.  Author Kent Nerburn wrote a book _ LETTERS TO MY SON: A Father's Wisdom on Manhood, Life, and Love. In one letter, he _ his son the value of generosity:  "Remember to be _ to others. We are all children of _ , and none can say _ some fields blossom while others lie poor in the hot sun. Care for those around you. Look past your _ . Their dreams are no less than yours, and their choices in life are no more easily made. And give. Give in any _ that you can, of whatever you possess. To give is to _ . To withhold(;) is to wither . _ less for your harvest than how it is shared, and your life will have meaning and your heart will have peace."  How _ it is for one boy that his father is showing him how to truly live!  People who live well are expert at giving. They give their money. They give their time. They _ their wisdom and skills. They quickly say yes when _ to help.  For them, the formula is _ : to give is to love and to love is to live. It's a formula for a successful life.
